step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Keep your hands clasped gently in your lap, maintaining an upright posture.
You're raising your hands well. Try to keep your elbows a bit closer to your head as you lift them.
Nicely done spreading your elbows wide behind your head. Focus on keeping your head upright and not pulling forward.
Holding steady! Remember to maintain that upright head position and relaxed shoulders.
Great job reversing the motion smoothly. Ensure your wrists stay aligned as you return to the starting position.
Second rep starting strong! Continue with hands clasped in your lap, maintaining good posture.
Good lift. Focus on bringing your elbows closer to your head as you raise your clasped hands.
Excellent spread of the elbows behind your head. Keep your head tall and avoid any forward pull.
Holding the stretch well. Remember the tip to keep your head upright and shoulders relaxed.
Smooth return to the start. Ensure your wrists are aligned and you're not forcing the movement.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the Clasp and Spread exercise! Focus on keeping your elbows close to your head when raising your hands and spreading them wide behind your head. Remember to maintain an upright posture and avoid pulling forward to maximize the stretch.
